youtube_only.description: Configuration for YouTube data extraction only

github_only.description: Configuration for GitHub data extraction only

reddit_and_youtube.description: Configuration for both Reddit and YouTube data extraction
reddit_and_youtube.note: This configuration uses MultiServerMCPClient format for multiple servers

langgraph_studio.description: How to configure MCP servers in LangGraph Studio
steps: 1. Start the MCP servers using the startup scripts
2. In LangGraph Studio, go to Configuration settings
3. Set mcp_config.url to the appropriate server URL
4. Optionally specify which tools to include in mcp_config.tools array
5. Test the configuration by running a research query

programmatic_usage.description: How to use MCP servers programmatically

tools.name: get_reddit_posts
tools.description: Fetch posts from a specific subreddit

parameters.subreddit: Name of the subreddit (without r/ prefix)
parameters.limit: Number of posts to fetch (default: 10, max: 100)

tools.name: get_reddit_comments
tools.description: Fetch comments from a specific Reddit post

parameters.post_url: Full URL or Reddit permalink to the post
parameters.limit: Number of top-level comments to fetch (default: 20, max: 100)

tools.name: search_reddit
tools.description: Search Reddit content for specific queries

parameters.subreddit: Optional subreddit to limit search to (without r/ prefix)
parameters.limit: Number of results to return (default: 10, max: 50)

tools.name: get_youtube_comments
tools.description: Fetch comments from a YouTube video

parameters.video_id: YouTube video ID or full YouTube URL
parameters.limit: Number of comments to fetch (default: 50, max: 100)
Number of results to return (default: 10, max: 50)

tools.name: get_video_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a YouTube video

parameters.video_id: YouTube video ID or full YouTube URL

tools.name: get_repository_issues
tools.description: Fetch issues from a specific GitHub repository

parameters.limit: Number of issues to fetch (default: 20, max: 100)

tools.name: get_issue_comments
tools.description: Fetch comments from a specific GitHub issue

parameters.limit: Number of comments to fetch (default: 30, max: 100)
Number of repositories to return (default: 20, max: 100)

tools.name: get_repository_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific GitHub repository

tools.name: search_issues
tools.description: Search for GitHub issues across all repositories

parameters.query: Search query string (can include qualifiers like 'repo:owner/name', 'state:open', 'label:bug')
parameters.limit: Number of issues to return (default: 20, max: 100)

common_issues.solution: Ensure the MCP servers are running on the correct ports (8001 for Reddit, 8002 for YouTube, 8003 for GitHub)
Check that all required environment variables are set in .env file
Reduce the limit parameters in tool calls or implement delays between requests
Verify the tool names match exactly and the servers are properly configured
